articles.author: India Today Web Desk
articles.title: Over 70 killed in massive building fire in South Africa's Johannesburg - India Today
articles.description: A massive fire in a residential building in South Africa's Johannesburg killed more than 70 people and injured over 53 others. Rescue operations were underway, and it is feared that more people might be trapped inside.
articles.content:
At least 73 people died in a massive fire on Thursday in a multi-story residential building in South Africa’s Johannesburg, the municipal officials confirmed. More than 50 others were injured.
